hero.subtitle: Ardayda ugu fiican ee jaamacadaha ugu wanaagsan ee Iswiidhan. Macalimiinta wanaagsan, mushaar cadaalad ah, qiimo jaban.

howItWorks.label: Sida ay u shaqeyso
howItWorks.title: Saddex tallaabo oo fudud
howItWorks.step1Title: Noo sheeg waxa aad u baahan tahay
howItWorks.step1Desc: Maaddo, heer iyo hadaf â€” waan dhageysannaynaa waan fahannaa.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Arday sare oo la doortay oo leh khibrad saxda ah.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Casharro dabacsan, natiijoooyin la cabbiri karo.

whyMeritia.label: Maxay Meritia
whyMeritia.title: Hab ka fiican
whyMeritia.body1: Waxbarasho wanaagsan kaliya ma aha aqoonâ€”waa in ardayga si dhab ah loo fahmo. Waxaan arday kasta ku xidhnaa macalin ku habboon xawligiisa, yoolkiisa iyo sida uu u fikirayo.
whyMeritia.body2: Halkii xalal guud laga bixin lahaa, waxaan diiradda saarnaa joogteyn iyo jihayn cad. Kulan kasta wuxuu ku dhismaa kii hore si horumar la arki karo waqti ka dib.
whyMeritia.body3: Natiijadu waa waxbarasho degan, kalsooni badan, iyo qorshe si dhab ah u sii shaqeeya.
whyMeritia.adv1Desc: Kaliya ardayda ugu sarreeya ee jaamacadaha waaweyn. Si taxaddar leh loo doortay loona tababaray.
whyMeritia.adv2Desc: Faaâ€™iido yar. Waxaad bixinaysaa tayada waxbarashada, ma aha dhexdhexaadayaal.
whyMeritia.adv3Desc: Waxaan bixin karnaa ilaa 40% ka badan hayâ€™adaha caadiga ah si aan u helno kuwa ugu fiican.

testimonials.label: Dib u eegis
testimonials.title: Waxa dadka kale yiraahdaan
testimonials.t1Text: Gabadhaydii waxay ka soo boodday C ilaa A xisaabta hal semester gudihiis. Macalimiinta KTH way cajiib yihiin.
testimonials.t2Text: Ugu dambeyn adeeg u dhaqma macalimiinta ixtiraam. Dabacsan, si fiican loo bixiyo, oo xirfad leh.
testimonials.t3Text: Tayadu heer kale bay ku jirtaa. Wiilkayagu wuu jecel yahay casharradiisa.

cta.title: Diyaar ma u tahay inaad heerka kor u qaaddo?
cta.subtitle: La tashi talo bilaash ah oo arag sida Meritia u caawin karto ilmahaaga inay gaaraan hadafkooda waxbarasho.

forParents.label: Waalidiinta
forParents.subtitle: Meritia waxay ku xidhaa ilmahaaga ardayda ugu fiican ee KTH, Karolinska Institutet iyo HandelshÃ¶gskolan. Tayo wanaagsan, qiimo jaban â€” iyada oo aan wax laga dhimin.
forParents.b1Desc: Kuma qanacsana? Waxaan kuu helnaa mid kale oo bilaash ah ama lacagta ku celinnaa.
forParents.b2Desc: Waxaan helnaa macalinka saxda ah ee ku salaysan maaddo, heer, shakhsiyad iyo qaabka barashada.
forParents.b3Desc: Habkayagu wuxuu ka dhigan yahay in lacag badan ay u aaddo macalinka â€” adna aad ka badan bixisid.
forParents.b4Desc: Xisaabta, fiisigiska, kimistariga, Ingiriisiga, Iswidhishka, barnaamijyada iyo wax badan.
forParents.pricingTitle: Wax badan macalinka, wax yar dhexdhexaadiyeyaasha
forParents.pricingDesc: Shirkadaha dhaqameed waxay qaataan 40â€“60% waxa aad bixiso. Meritia, intooda badan toos bay u aadaan macalinkaaga.
forParents.ctaTitle: Diyaar ma u tahay inaad bilowdo?
forParents.ctaSubtitle: Noo sheeg waxa aad u baahan tihiin, waxaanan helnaa macalinka saxda ah.

becomeTutor.label: Noqo macalin
becomeTutor.subtitle: Ma ka wax baranaysaa KTH, Karolinska Institutet ama HandelshÃ¶gskolan? Maanta codso oo ku biir kooxda macalimiinta ugu sarreeya ee Stockholm.
becomeTutor.p1Desc: Waxaan bixinnaa ilaa 40% ka badan boostiyeyaasha kale.
becomeTutor.p2Desc: Adiga ayaa jadwalka go'aamisa â€” annaga waan la qabsannaa.
becomeTutor.p3Desc: Ku biir shabakad ardayda ugu fiican ee KTH, KI iyo Handels.
becomeTutor.p4Desc: Codsi degdeg ah, tallaabooyin aan loo baahnayn ma jiraan.
becomeTutor.thankYou: Mahadsanid codsigaaga! Waan kuula soo noqon doonaa dhawaan.
becomeTutor.whyBody1: Waxaan Meritia u dhisnay si waxbarashada gaarka ahi u noqoto mid dhab ahaan xirfad leh â€” arday, waalid iyo adiga tutor ahaanba. Filasho cad, hab dhisan, iyo qadarin waqtigaaga.
becomeTutor.whyBody2: Waxaad helaysaa dabacsanaan, balse keligaa lagama tagayo: waxaan taageernaa is-waafajinta, yoolalka iyo joogteynta si arday kastaa u helo qorshe macquul ah oo uu ku socdo.
becomeTutor.whyBody3: Marka tayadu sarreyso, shaqadu way ka macaan tahay. Arday fiican, kulammo fiican, natiijo fiican â€” iyo mushahar taas la jaan qaadaya.

contact.label: La xiriir
contact.subtitle: La tashi talo bilaash ah ama su'aal weydii. Waxaan ka jawaab celinnaa 24 saac gudahood.
contact.messagePlaceholder: Noo sheeg sida aan kuu caawin karno...
contact.consultationDesc: Talo bilaash ah oo 15 daqiiqo ah oo aan ka wada hadalno baahiyaha ilmahaaga oo aan helno macalinka saxda ah.
contact.thankYou: Mahadsanid! Waan kuula soo noqon doonaa 24 saac gudahood.

about.label: Ku saabsan Meritia
about.subtitle: Meritia waxaa lagu aasaasay Stockholm fikrad fudud: haddii macalimiintu mushaar wanaagsan helaan, waxbarashaduna way wanaagsanaataa. Haddii dhexdhexaadiyeyaasha la yareeyana, waalidiintu wax yar ayay bixiyaan.
about.storyP1: Annaga oo ah arday KTH iyo Handels, waxaan aragnay sida shirkadaha macalinimaadku u shaqeeyaan: waxay qaadanayeen faa'iidooyin wayn, macalimiinta si xun u bixin jireen, tayona dhexdhexaad ahayd.
about.storyP2: Meritia waxay ka dhalatay qirashadii in jid ka wanaagsan jiro. Iyadoo kaliya ka shaqaalaysanayno KTH, Karolinska Institutet iyo HandelshÃ¶gskolan waxaan hubinnaa tayada waxbarasho. Iyadoo yareynayna faa'iidadayada waxaan macalimiinta siinnaa mushaar horumar.
about.storyP3: Maanta, Meritia waa adeega waxbarashada gaarka ee ugu sarreeya Stockholm.
about.v1Desc: Kaliya ardayda ugu fiican ee jaamacadaha ugu sharafta badan ee Iswiidhan.
about.v2Desc: Waxaan u aasaasnay inaan macalimiinta siinno waxa ay mudan yihiin â€” ilaa 40% oo dheeraad ah.
about.v3Desc: Macalimiinta yar, tayo sare. Habka doorashadu si ula kac ah ayuu u adag yahay.
about.ctaTitle: Ma rabtaa inaad wax badan ogaato?
about.ctaSubtitle: Waan ku faraxnaa inaan kaa sheekeyno sida Meritia u shaqeyso.
about.valuesQuote: Ma dhisayno suuq. Waxaan dhisaynaa heer.

programming.description: Macalimiintayada KTH waxay ka mid yihiin barnaamij sameeyadii ugu xirfadda badnaa ee Iswiidhan.

modernLanguages.title: Luqadaha casriga
modernLanguages.description: Macalimiintayada luqadaha waa kuwa si fiican u hadla oo leh aqoon waxbarasho.
topics: Naxwaha, ku dhawaaqida iyo wada sheekaysiga
